thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Roisin
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Roisin

author: Roisin
title: Roisin
text: It has been a while since I have received such amazing service. Order received fast with no complications. I had to exchange and again very simple straight forward service. Exceptional customer service from Nadine. I actually cant remember the last time I came across a more helpful sales assistant. I wouldn't hesitate in ordering on line again.
